channel.title: Games, that if announced, would make you do a backflip.
channel.description: -Next installment of Half-Life series —PC— (figured I'd start with an obvious one) -Jak & Daxter series continuation —PS3— -An all new, more mature Nintendo IP. —Wii U—

item.title: Games, that if announced, would make you do a backflip.
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
A TRUE sequel to Unreal 1, by Epic (fuck that Unreal 2 bullshit), with a large focus on recreating the same atmosphere the original had. I loved their approach of how the dead would tell the story, and the more you looked the more you understood what was going on. It always felt more like an adventure than most FPS games.

Also, they should get Alexander Brandon to do the music. His work was fucking fantastic and really set the game’s tone:
Surfacing

Dusk Horizon

Read full topic

item.title: Games, that if announced, would make you do a backflip.
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Last night I was thinking that a Mass Effect co-op game would be really sweet. It’s already squad-based; it seems like a logical step to drop two other human players into the squad with you. Everything would need to be rebalanced, but still, it’d be awesome.

item.title: Games, that if announced, would make you do a backflip.
item.dc:creator: toasterpastry
item.description:
Finally decided to utilize my account so here-

I organized mine from most wanted to least:

-All Valve games with the #3 in them (Valve, why u no count to 3?)

-Star Wars Battlefront 3

-System Shock 3

-Fallout on the Creation Engine

-Another Deus Ex game (Don’t get me wrong, I loved HR, it just didn’t feel
like a Deus Ex game to me…)

-A LoZ game in the style of the N64 games (I don’t really like the look of Skyward Sword)

-Homefront 2

-Crysis / Far Cry 3

-Rainbow Six Vegas 3

-GTA V

-Alan Wake 2 (Hopefully for PC this time, not likely though (Goddamn Platform Exclusives))

-A new 3D pokemon game that combines Gens 1-4 (Would never happen but still…)

item.source: Games, that if announced, would make you do a backflip.

item.title: Games, that if announced, would make you do a backflip.
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

Nono, the spirit of that was “remake”… He means the spirit of “blatantly Star Wars inspired space-odyssey which manages to have a juvenile charm without talking down to its playerbase”. I think.

That’s more or less correct .

Starfox 64 3D is essentially Starfox 64, which is all well and good for Nintendo since they wanted to have some good games on the 3DS. However, the game didn’t really require a remake IMO. It’s still really fun and holds its own against modern flying games as far as how easy and fun it is to fly around and shoot stuff. The advances in technology since it was released won’t really benefit it except as far as graphics go, and Nintendo games aren’t really about graphics. What I want is a brand new Starfox game that plays like Starfox 64 - smooth controls, fun to play, and nothing but vehicle missions. None of this action platformer stuff that Adventures had. I understand Assault was kinda more like the original formula but I didn’t hear very good reviews about it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
I would fucking die if they brought project offset back.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rkoi6WCCJHY&feature=player_detailpage#t=82s

That footage was from 2004. I first saw this on fucking SCREENSAVERS. ON FUCKING TECH TV.

Shit. Now it’s dead. Thanks, Intel.

If this could come back somehow, I’d be flying. Idgaf if it’s compared to elder scrolls.

item.title: Games, that if announced, would make you do a backflip.
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Orpheon:

Chrono Trigger 2 (Chrono Cross was just in the same universe right?)

I’d buy it. Chrono Cross (maybe) only had one of the playable characters from Chrono Trigger. Guile (or whatever his name was, masked wizard) was originally supposed to be Magus, but they had to scrap that side story because they had, like, 40 characters, and no, they aren’t allowed to expand on one of the most awesome characters in the original game. They had to expand on other characters instead. :meh:

Plus, Schala’s hair is supposed to be blue, not blonde.

Read full topic

item.title: Games, that if announced, would make you do a backflip.
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
It’s already been mentioned, but Jedi Knight 4, as long as it’s more like 1+2 and less like 3. Being Kyle Katarn was most of the fun of that game.

Also:
Jet Force Gemini 2 or remake of original
Mass Effect MMO
Chrono Trigger 2 (Chrono Cross was just in the same universe right?)
Tales of Symphonia 3 - that is, if it’s like 1 and not like 2
A Starfox game that recaptures the spirit the original game and Starfox 64 had
An Age of Empires 2 remake, or a sequel with that time period and style of gameplay

Read full topic
